name: Atomic Wilds Demo
description:
Some menu options don't currently work and there are many missing sounds files. Included is the entire overworld map to explore (roughly 90%). Dungeons are currently being worked on. Please leave feedback below.

Explore a post apocalyptic world in an attempt to restore balance to nature. Discover 7 hidden weapon factories and the treasures hidden within. Find upgrades to personalize your shooting and exploration experience. Get help from the ghosts of humanities past to solve the riddle of its future.
